page.title: 07Sports and Activities.
page.content: Although the population of Somerton is less than 5000, there are plenty of things to do in your spare time. Somerton Sports Club has grown over the years and now has a new lounge bar, Snooker Club and facilities for cricket, football, bowls and tennis as well as play equipment for children. In the Wessex Centre in Broad Street there is a Youth Club for children from 7 to 16 which meets on different nights.There are also Cubs, Brownies, Guides, Scouts,Boys' Brigade and Army Cadets.There is an Over- Sixties Club and an Old Age Pensioners' Association.The Women's Royal Voluntary Service organise Meals on Wheels and provide a Luncheon Club for the elderly and handicapped. At the last count there were nearly 50 sports and activities.
